CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Autonomix, we're developing a two-fold technology that can both detect malfunctioning neural signals and ablate nerves in one simple procedure for pain management. This opens us up to a world of possibilities in the field of electrophysiology. Clinical trials start this year for the treatment of pancreatic cancer pain and pancreatitis pain.
